title: 多人生存服务器后期干啥
author: 我很渣123
txt_content: 基岩版，目前做完了掠夺塔，守卫者农场，极限刷怪塔，猪人塔，村民交易所，地狱交通，混凝土工厂

replies.author: zero°C.
replies.txt_content:
加变态mod
比如无尽贪婪，
直接回到解放前

replies.author: j19950909
replies.txt_content: 后期养老钓鱼种菜他不香么

replies.author: guaiMiao~
replies.txt_content: 熊你的基友，拆你基友家

replies.author: 卡壳
replies.txt_content: 养老啊

replies.author: ljyys
replies.txt_content: 是时候试试万能的红石了x

replies.author: 我很渣123
replies.txt_content: 还有很多没做，比如极限史莱姆农场，女巫塔，恶魂塔，凋零树场，凋零刷石机，蘑菇牛????农场

replies.author: 小林最牛
replies.txt_content:
做tnt
玩tnt，铁砧，射箭

replies.author: jjwwhjj
replies.txt_content: 建议钻研造主城

replies.author: 尧leon
replies.txt_content: 我觉得你在水帖

replies.txt_content: 造个房子种个地 开始养老模式

replies.author: 剑齿虎
replies.txt_content: 大工程搞起来

replies.author: -xiao_kai-
replies.txt_content: 养老种菜，钓鱼，玩到后期很无聊了

replies.author: wyf0730
replies.txt_content: 养老吧哈哈

replies.author: sliverfish
replies.txt_content: 做tnt 炸tnt 然后重头开始

replies.author: Steve7981
replies.txt_content: 搞建筑，红石，各种自动农场，可以的话pvp

replies.author: 许灬愿
replies.txt_content: 玩pvp呀~

replies.author: StBruce
replies.txt_content: 加mod，多模组发展，怪物增强拆家，换新图重新开始，玩建筑，玩红石

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content: 盖房子吧

replies.author: cyxzbd
replies.txt_content: 和朋友一起玩乐，养老qwq

replies.author: 猫眼
replies.txt_content: 建筑，整基建

replies.author: 我是木木
replies.txt_content: 所有的农场都做一遍 然后升版本再修一遍((

replies.author: 淡风顺水
replies.txt_content: 养老养萌新

replies.author: 幽冥冥灬
replies.txt_content: 后期只能养老了（啥游戏玩到后期都差不多）
